name: Ballon (PJO)
description:
The little guy only has one projectile - his harpoon. Fire it by using the mouse. If you hit a wall, the little guy will be dragged along with the heavy harpoon.

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Whiskey on the Mississippi" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
